headline: IBM and the EY organization debut artificial intelligence-powered global tax compliance solutions
summary: IBM (NYSE: IBM) and the EY organization continue to build upon their multiyear alliance, today announcing the availability of EY.ai for tax, built with IBM watsonx. The alliance couples watsonx, IBM's portfolio of artificial intelligence (AI) technologies, with the EY organization's deep domain experience to address the largest challenges facing tax departments.

headline: IBM and Scuderia Ferrari HP Debut Reimagined Mobile App to Supercharge Global Formula 1 Fan Experience
summary: IBM (NYSE: IBM) and Scuderia Ferrari HP today introduced a newly reimagined mobile app experience designed to bring the passionate global fanbase of nearly 400 million Tifosi closer than ever to cars, drivers and races they love.
